## Source Verification Checklist
<!-- All sources must be verified -->

- [ ] URL is accessible and not behind paywall
- [ ] Source is from a reputable archive (e.g., patents.google.com, LENR-CANR, Tesla Universe, FBI Vault)
- [ ] Author and publication date are verifiable
- [ ] Content does not promote unverified pseudoscience
- [ ] Source contains actual research data, not just speculation

## Suggested Package

- [ ] `@chicago-forest/tesla-archive` - For Tesla patents and documents
- [ ] `@chicago-forest/lenr-database` - For LENR/Cold Fusion papers
- [ ] Other: <!-- specify -->

---

## Important Notes

**Real Sources We Document:**
- Tesla's actual patents (US645576A, US787412A, etc.)
- Mallove's Infinite Energy magazine archives
- Moray's witnessed demonstrations and patents
- LENR research papers with DOIs
- Active companies (Brillouin Energy, Clean Planet, etc.)
- Government programs (NASA Glenn, DARPA, Japanese NEDO)
- Declassified documents (FBI Tesla files)

**We Do NOT Accept:**
- Fabricated sources or fake URLs
- Unverified claims presented as fact
- Content claiming theoretical systems are operational
- Sources promoting harmful pseudoscience

---

*This project serves social justice by preserving suppressed/ignored research and making it accessible. All sources must be real, verifiable, and properly attributed.*
